item.title: Ricky Gervais Adult Animated Comedy Series ‘Alley Cats’ Set at Netflix
item.description: “I play a fat, lazy, rude, opinionated creature with fangs, who’s not as smart or brave as he thinks he is. So quite a stretch.”
